dc_title_s: Morenci: compiled & drawn expressly for the Lenawee County atlas.
dc_description_s: Cadastral map showing some land ownership. From George B. Cadwell & Co. Atlas of Lenawee County, Michigan. [Adrian, Mich.?]: George B. Cadwell Co., 1893. 1 map: hand col.; 68 x 91 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
